text: "Ain't Sayin' Nothin'" is the second single from Fat Joe's album The Elephant in the Room. It also has a sample of Cocababy at the end of the video. The song features Plies and Dre. Lil Wayne, Ace Hood, Rocko, DJ Khaled, Rick Ross, Cool (of Cool & Dre), Birdman, Danja & Pitbull made appearances in the video. The song peaked at number 93 on the US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs chart. ==Remix== The official remix was made, featuring rappers The Game and Lil Wayne with a new verse by Fat Joe himself and Dre still on the chorus. In the remix, Fat Joe mocks his rival, G-Unit rapper 50 Cent, by saying, "You heard Game his enemies' my enemy Young Buck callin me say he wanna be a friend of me." This is in reference to both The Game and Young Buck leaving G-Unit. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2009) !Peak position |- |US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) |align="center"|93 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2008 singles Category:Fat Joe songs Category:Plies (rapper) songs Category:Cool & Dre songs Category:Song recordings produced by Cool & Dre Category:2008 songs Category:Imperial Records singles Category:Songs written by Fat Joe Category:Songs written by Dre (producer) Category:Songs written by Marcello Valenzano Category:Songs written by Plies (rapper)
title: Ain't Sayin' Nothin'
